name: Author Box WP Lens
author: Andrej

sections.description:
This plugin was originally known as “Author Box for Divi.”

The Author Box WP Lens plugin has been developed to work specifically with the Divi theme but has been upgraded to work with any WordPress theme or page builder. It will provide you with nice author boxes for your WordPress blog or website, whichever theme or page builder you use.

Using this plugin, a simple author box that will show the WordPress author bio will be displayed automatically at the bottom of all your blog posts, pages, projects, or media. You can choose in the plugin’s settings on which post types you want it to show.

The plugin will show the author’s gravatar icon by default. Or you can use your own image; just enter the URL of your profile image in Users > Your Profile. You can also specify the URLs for your social network profiles (only those that you enter will show in your author box).

Other features of this plugin allow you to specify the Name Prefix (you can write, e.g., “Author” or “Written by”), Text Color, Background Color and Border Color.

Plugin Features:

  • Over 45 Social Media Icons
  • Name Prefix
  • Text Color
  • Background Color
  • Border Color
  • Icons Color
  • Social Icons as Original Color
  • Border Radius
  • Disable On Post Types
  • Exclude Categories
  • Open Links in a new Tab
  • Add an email icon
  • Add a website icon
  • Hyperlink to the author page
  • Author Box Preview in the WP admin panel
  • Guest Authors PRO
  • Multiple Authors PRO
  • Link Attributes PRO
  • Customizable Options PRO
  • Font Control PRO
  • Placement Options PRO
  • Gutenberg Block PRO
  • Shortcode PRO
  • Widgets PRO

This plugin works with any WordPress theme and page builder.
sections.installation:
1. Search for the plugin in the WordPress plugin directory in your WP admin dashboard
  2. Click “Install Now” and after that activate the plugin
  3. The plugin will already be active
  4. Adjust the plugin settings in WP admin panel in “Users > Your Profile” and “Author Box for Divi”
sections.faq:
Does this plugin works with Divi Theme only?

No, the plugin works with any WordPress theme. Formerly, it had been developed to work specifically with the Divi theme, but this has changed.
sections.changelog:
2.0.1

  • Fixed a bug with the Divi theme CSS broken layout
  • Fixed a bug with the “Social Icon as original Color” setting not working properly
  • Fixed a bug with the social icons and profile picture showing underlines on the Twenty Fifteen theme

2.0

  • Launched the premium version of the plugin
  • Renamed the plugin to “Author Box WP Lens”
  • A couple of new features added, including more social media icons, or a preview of the author box’s current look right in the WP admin panel
  • Fixed a bug with the author box not showing

1.4.6

  • Fixed a bug with the icons not displaying in one line

1.4.5

  • Tested with WP 6.4

1.4.4

  • Tested with WP 6.3

1.4.3

Fixed: Fixed CSS Bug

1.4.2

Fixed: Author Photograph not showing

1.4.1

  • Tested with WP 6.2
  • New feature added: to customize the color of the social media icons
  • New feature added: The possibility to make the author’s name to be a hyperlink to the author page
  • Fixed Photo

1.4

  • New feature added: ability to add website and email icons
  • New feature added: ability to show icons with other themes than just Divi

1.3.5

  • New feature added: ability set links to open in new window

1.3.4

  • Tested with WP 6.1

1.3.3

  • Tested with WP 6.0

1.3.1

  • Tested with WP 5.9

1.3

  • Disable author box for certain authors

1.2.2

  • Tested up to v5.7 of WordPress

1.2

  • Added ability to disable author box on selected categories

1.1

  • Added ability to disable author box on selected post types

1.0.6

  • Added Spanish translation

1.0.5

  • Translation related fix

1.0.4

  • Added text domain to plugin file

1.0.3

  • Added new feature

1.0.2

  • Fixed issue related to translations not loading

1.0.1

  • Small bug fix

1.0

  • Initial release
